title: Letter to Santa
creator_credit: John Davis, Ursula Kolbe and Davis Film and Video Production
brief_description: An enchanting puppet story about a country which is desperately short of water. Sally writes to Santa, saying that she will forgo presents this year if he can only make it rain. Santa builds a giant snowball and tows it behind his sleigh all the way to Australia but the snowball is too heavy.
